description:
'''Roger Charlery''' (22 February 1963 â€“ 26 March 2019), known professionally as '''Ranking Roger''', was an English musician. He was a vocalist in the 1980s [[ska]] band [[The Beat (British band)|the Beat]] (known in North America as the English Beat) and later [[New wave music|new wave]] band [[General Public]]. He subsequently was the frontman for a reformed Beat lineup.

The "Ranking" moniker is short for "top-ranking" or "high-ranking", and was a titular boast common amongst reggae music [[Emcees|MCs]].
